titles.title: God Will Take Care of You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Be not dismayed whate'er betide, God will take care of you; Beneath His wings of love abide, God will take care of you. God will take care of you, through ev'ry day, o'er all the way; He will take care of you, God will take care of you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Through days of toil when heart doth fail, God will take care of you; When dangers fierce your path assail, God will take care of you. God will take care of you, through ev'ry day, o'er all the way; He will take care of you, God will take care of you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All you may need He will provide, God will take care of you; Nothing you ask will be denied, God will take care of you. God will take care of you, through ev'ry day, o'er all the way; He will take care of you, God will take care of you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: No matter what may be the test, God will take care of you; Lean, weary one, upon His breast, God will take care of you. God will take care of you, through ev'ry day, o'er all the way; He will take care of you, God will take care of you.
